 IFlowNodeHandle IChangeHistoryEvent.getDeliverTarget()

Methods in com.ibm.team.scm.common with parameters of type IFlowNodeHandle
 void IFlowTable.addAcceptFlow(IFlowNodeHandle source, UUID remoteRepoIdentifier, java.lang.String remoteRepoURI, java.util.Collection componentScopes, java.lang.String description)
          Creates a flow entry (with description) adding the given workspace as an accept source, and declaring a list of component filters (can be empty) to be used when determining which change sets to be accepted.
 void IFlowTable.addDeliverFlow(IFlowNodeHandle target, UUID remoteRepoIdentifier, java.lang.String remoteRepoURI, java.util.Collection componentScopes, java.lang.String description)
          Creates a flow entry (with description) adding the given workspace as a deliver target, and declaring a list of component filters (can be empty) to be used when determining which change sets to be delivered.
 IFlowEntry IFlowTable.getAcceptFlow(IFlowNodeHandle source)
          Get the accept flow entry which has the specified flow node as an accept source.
 IFlowEntry IFlowTable.getAcceptFlow(IFlowNodeHandle source, java.util.Collection componentScopes)
          Get the accept flow entry which has the specified workspace & component scopes as an accept source.
 java.util.Collection IFlowTable.getComponentScopes(IFlowNodeHandle node)
          Returns the component scopes for the given flow node.
 IFlowEntry IFlowTable.getDeliverFlow(IFlowNodeHandle target)
          Get the deliver flow entry which has the specified flow node as a deliver target.

          Get the deliver flow entry which has the specified workspace & component scopes as a deliver target.
 void IFlowTable.removeAcceptFlow(IFlowNodeHandle source)
          Removes flow entries that have the given node as an accept source.
 void IFlowTable.removeAll(IFlowNodeHandle target)
          Removes all flow entries that have the given node as a deliver target or as an accept source.
 void IFlowTable.removeDeliverFlow(IFlowNodeHandle target)
          Removes flow entries that have the given node as a deliver target.
 void IFlowTable.setComponentScopes(IFlowNodeHandle node, java.util.Collection componentScopes)
          Sets the component scopes for the given flow node.
